item.title: Carla add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "When someone shows you who they are believe them; the first time." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Carla add a quote by Apple Computer Inc.
item.description: "Here's to the crazy ones. The misfits. The rebels. The troublemakers. The round pegs in the square holes. The ones who see things differently. They're not fond of rules. And they have no respect for the status quo. You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them. About the only thing you can't do is ignore them. Because they change things. They push the human race forward. And while some may see them as the crazy ones, we see genius. Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do." -- Apple Computer Inc.

item.title: Carla add a quote by George R. R. Martin
item.description: "Sleep is good, he said, And books are better." -- George R. R. Martin

item.title: Carla add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "A reader lives a thousand lives before he dies, said Jojen. The man who never reads lives only one." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Carla add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "A mind needs books as a sword needs a whetstone, if it is to keep its edge." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Carla add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Carla add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Loyalty to country ALWAYS. Loyalty to government, when it deserves it." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Carla add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "God created war so that Americans would learn geography." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Carla add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "Not all those who wander are lost." -- J.R.R. Tolkien
